name: agroboost-monorepo
description: ALLO TRACTEUR - Plateforme de rÃ©servation de services agricoles (Backend + Admin Panel)

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:frontend" --names "BACKEND,ADMIN,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta,yellow"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../admin-agro-boost && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
